revision.comment: Rescuing 2 sources and tagging 0 as dead. #IABot (v1.5.2)
revision.text:
'''Don Hillsman II''' is a professional [[penciller]] and [[inker]]. He has worked for [[comic book]] companies such as [[DC Comics]], [[Marvel Comics]], [[CrossGen]], [[Dark Horse Comics]], [[Caliber Comics]] and others.
==Bibliography== ===Comics=== * [[X-Men]] * Demon Storm * Spawn pinups * ''[[Decimation (comics)|Decimation]] * ''[[Edge (comics)|Edge]]'' 1–6,8–9, 11–12 * ''[[Gambit (comics)|Gambit: Hath No Fury]]'' * ''[[Gambit (comics)|Gambit: House of Cards]]'' * ''[[House Of M]]: Fantastic 4 and Iron Man'' * ''New X-Men: Academy X 3: X-Posed * ''[[Scion (comics)|Scion]] 1: Conflict of Conscience'' * ''Scion 2: Blood for Blood''
===Books=== * ''Horrors of the Wasted West'' (Deadlands: Hell on Earth) (2002) Pinnacle Entertainment Group—Interior Artist * ''Way of the Dead, The'' (Deadlands: The Weird West) (2002) Pinnacle Entertainment Group—Cover Artist * ''Marshal's Handbook'', Revised Ed. (Deadlands: The Weird West) (2001) Pinnacle Entertainment Group—Interior Artist
===Skate Boarding=== Don Hillsman II is also a professional Skateboarder who was sponsored by Converse and a few more companies and has gone to several countries for skate contests in the late 80's and early-mid 90's.
==External links== * [https://web.archive.org/web/20070312031604/http://www.galacticquest.com/politics.htm CROSSGEN Comics], The Don Hillsman Interview, January 2000 * [https://web.archive.org/web/20060526175100/http://www.scifidimensions.com/Nov01/donhillsman.htm Scifi Dimensions], Interview: Don Hillsman II, John C. Snider * [www.dh2proworks.blogspot.com Updates on Hillsman's work on "Planet Killers"
{{DEFAULTSORT:Hillsman, Don, Ii}} [[Category:American comics artists]] [[Category:Living people]] [[Category:Year of birth missing (living people)]]
